segments.text: The boy is stretching so high, trying to reach into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the determination on his face as he tries to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and it's making me nervous just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets what he wants and gets down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the anticipation on her face as she waits for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they would be more careful; that stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around and sees them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch this; it's making me too anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they would just get down and be safe.
segments.speaker: PAR
